private diseasesbyNames; // get disease.disease_hash by giving its name: example: ["name of a disease"] => [leiojej757575ero]  where leiojej757575ero is disease_hash of a Disease. Set visibility to private because mapping with strings as keys have issues when public visibility (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#638
if(solution != 0x0) revert();  //prevent the same answer from awarding twice (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#321
if(rwd != 0x0) revert();  //prevent the same period from issuing twice (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#707
if(rwd != 0x0) revert();  //prevent the same interval from having 2 periods (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#742

if(diseasesbyIds[_diseasehash] != 0x0) revert();  //prevent the same disease from being created twice. The software manages diseases uniqueness based on their unique english name. Note that even the first disease will not have index of 0 thus should pass this check (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#1107

if(diseases[diseasesbyIds[_diseasehash]].disease_hash != _diseasehash) revert(); // second check not necessary but I decided to add it as the gas cost value for security is worth it (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#1130

if(existing_proposal != 0x0 || proposals[_proposed_release_hash].id != 0) revert();  //prevent the same raw_release_hash from being submited twice on same proposal. Double check for better security and slightly higher gas cost even though one would be enough ! (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#1144

if(existing_vote != 0x0 || votes[proposal.proposed_release_hash][msg.sender].amount != 0) revert();  //prevent the same user from voting twice for same raw_release_hash. Double condition check for better security and slightly higher gas cost even though one would be enough ! (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#1302

if(diseases[diseasesbyIds[_diseasehash]].disease_hash != _diseasehash) revert(); // second check not necessary but I decided to add it as the gas cost value for security is worth it (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EticaRelease__1.sol)#1605
